185991894.review: AI bot gets stuck very frequently. Out of the first 3 games I played with a friend and one AI bot, the bot got stuck on it's turn in each game. There is no way to end the AI's turn so the game can no longer be played. According to other reviews on Steam and online, this has been a known problem for YEARS. Seems like a very easy fix yet developers have no desire to fix it. Very disappointing because its a fun, casual game to play with friends.

185979833.review:
This review is a bit of a mixed bag, but overall positive. There are two different games built into this product, one with several expansions.

Settlers of Catan, with expansions, is beautifully designed and very intuitive. When you hover your mouse over an item on the playing board, a message pops up telling you about it. The only time this doesn't work is during start of play town placement, when I wanted to mouse over the seaports.

Rivals of Catan, however, has no such help. Unless you already know how to play that game, the tutorial won't teach you anything. Unlike Settlers, each player in Rivals has an individual board, and the opponent's board is off screen. The only instruction you're given (other than reading the rules from the menu at board left) is to hold Left-Shift to see the opponent's board. The AI plays too quickly to follow along, and the random event cards pop up and disappear so quickly it seems like the board changes senselessly. All in all, Rivals leaves a very poor impression of an unfamiliar game.

185978894.review: quiero jugar multijugador y no deja, los bot una mierd... se pega...

185976333.review: Man kann genau eine Map spielen, bis man in eine 6€ Paywall läuft. Auf der Map verändern sich weder die Zahlen, noch die Felder, noch die Häfen. Da fände ich ein ehrliches 6€ Spiel besser

185602911.review:
Catan Universe je projektem, jaký mohl trhnout rekordy. Místo toho skončí v propadlišti smíšených pocitů. U Osadníků by bylo rozhodně lepší zaplatit jednou za hru s rozšířeními než se mořit s hromadou mikrotransakcí, které vyjdou následně daleko dráž než koupě všech deskovek najednou. Ovládání je jednoduché, i když místy pozlobí. Vizuál na mě působí neuvěřitelně lacině, ale zvláštní zoomování a přizpůsobit se samotné hře je jen otázkou času. Hudba je na nervy lezoucí. Na stranu druhou, jsou to stále Osadníci z Katanu a ti byli a vždy budou velmi kvalitní deskovkou.

[url=https://www.gamingprofessors.cz/catan-universe-recenze//]Více v recenzi[/url]

185474916.review: los dados conllevan un patrón que no corresponden para nada con la arbitrariedad de los dados si no que se puede saber que números van a salir a partir de la 5 tirada, gran parte de la comunidad no juega siguiendo una estrategia de ganar, si no mas bien de acoso y derribo contra el mismo jugador, aunque de forma estratégica, sea más lógico no hacerlo dejando al jugador rezagado para después enfrentarse con solo el otro jugador. seguro que alguien dirá, tienes mal perder, pueden opinar lo que quieran, soy una persona que hasta me río cuando pierdo, si el ambiente es un ambiente sano, después de 21 horas he llegado a la conclusión que es un juego para jugar entre amigos para que sea un ambiente jovial, de la comunidad me llevo la idea de un puñado de carroñeros que no buscan divertirse si no instigar el mal ambiente.

Das Spiel ist unspielbar jedes Mal, wenn eine Runde im Multiplayer länger dauert, wird man ab einem bestimmten Punkt viele Runden zurückgesetzt. Danach synchronisiert das Spiel alle 20 Sekunden und man muss eine neue Runde starten.

185470165.review:
El juego en si es divertido, tiene bastante de RNG gracias a los dados, pero para los f2p es una real mierda, el solo hecho de que tenga una UNICA distribución hace que el juego se torne una mierda cada vez que juegas, es facil simplemente ganar jugando 6/9/10, el tema que juega en contra es simplemente el Rol de turnos, el que juega primero termina entrando 2 plazas al final del primer roleo, mientras que el que sale ultimo tiene ventaja, al final por muy ultimo que sea, si te pone 2 plazas en los lotes con "alta" probabilidad, tiene el 50% del juego hecho, aunque no es una regla general.
No lo recomiendo en absoluto, ya que del total de partidas que he tenido la posibilidad de juegar, han sido medianamente aceptables, el mayor problema es que por turno de jugador tienes 1.30Minutos, cuestion que es enfermante ya que, existen jugadores que se suelen molestar y te hacen esperar todo el tiempo, se toman una eternidad en hacer un turno solo por aquello, lo otro, NO TIENES CHAT a menos que pagues, imagina querer putear a alguien y no poder hacerlo ya que los emoticones son todos LGTB+4kHDPRO una mierda, la libertad de expresion a la mierda con este juego. en fin, una real cagada, si lo juegan espero consideren que al inicio sera divertido, y al final comenzaran a perder la paciencia por el MAL fair play del juego.

185463985.review: Ich liebe das Spiel, jedoch nervt es total, wenn man nicht zu 2. ohne Bot spielen kann und dieser sich mitten in der Runde (60% Chance in meinen letzten 10 Runden) aufhängt, weil dieser traden möchte. 185218697.review:
The map in the game is not set randomly, the map is the same in every game.

Sometimes a problem occurs in the game and it is very annoying that I should be able to build settlements or roads in some places, but for no reason it did not allow it and naturally I had to quit the game (while  there is no settlement  near or not out numbered). And I saw one time, someone is allowed to make settlement without spacing. It is very rare but there are times when it kicks me out of the game.

Editted:
I wouldn't buy this game or try other paid options unless I was sure about the map randomness, AI improvement and multiplayer communication. Because you can't make friends in the game. Also, when you play with real life friends while talking on the phone, buying it still doesn't work because you're playing the same game every time with the same map and bad AI. The game is made for single multiplayer and you're gambling whether you'll waste 30 minutes or enjoy it.

The AI ​​is so bad at trading at every level that the single player game is just a gamble based on numbers. There is no reason to continue for fun when even 1 player leaves the game with multiplayer. Especially, the AI ​​does not accept the trade even if a ridiculously good trade is offered (I tried a lot for the AI ​​even under any good or bad conditions). And when it makes a trade, it can at least check the current market value instead of always doing 1 to 1 for us (I think the AI ​​can be  allowed a bit of a cheat for that, no need for such thoughtful coding :D) and never accepts even if it makes the same deal or better. The AI wants to do something but does not know how to do. AI just try to make a trade at its own time (ok, I tried counter offer adding 1 more material to him at its own time... It still rejected me, again.) and it keeps irritating you by looping the same offer over and over again until you say yes or no.

Ok, only the paid ones can chat but they should let it communicate a little more with something. The ONLY GOOD THING about game is you can find players at any hour. However, when you can't react, there is no reason to bother with a real person and it's annoying. At least add an "I'm sorry" emoji or something, for God's sake, we can't trade thinking about the future, and if we cannot  it is not a strategy game. We can only make each other understand us by gambling on numbers right now and it never understands, so not explaining any action to each of us is boring, and it makes the game too lyrical (do not make  me talk  about 7s). We want to turn everything 4 to 1 so that we don't trade with each other, and no, not even just because of the fear of good materials go to others. Trading without just talking can be incredibly boring

184854572.review:
Catan Universe? More like Catan Unplayable. My experience with this game was an absolute trainwreck. The lobby system feels like it was designed by someone who’s never had friends to invite, and the servers? Let’s just say they make dial-up internet look reliable.

I hyped this game to my friends, and now they’re all mad at me for recommending it. We were halfway through a game when—boom! It crashed. Game over. Back to square one. It’s like the app wants to ruin friendships, not build them.

Creating a lobby is a nightmare. Want to add a friend? Hope you enjoy leaving and re-entering the lobby a dozen times. It’s as if they intentionally made it harder to socialize, which is ironic for a social game.

I love Catan, but this app? It’s like someone tried to port the game into a black hole of bad coding and thought, Yep, good enough. Fix your servers, fix your lobby, and maybe—just maybe—I’ll consider playing again.

184260364.review:
I love this game, especially playing it with friends. It is worth getting Cities and Knights DLC and Sea Farers, it adds much more depth to the base game.
That being said, the game is sometimes buggy, had issues making games with friends, sometimes when we played with an AI, the AI just froze at some point and that was it, it stays frozen.
We quit that game and took a break for some days, after which we came back, and it still offered to rejoin the same game with the broken AI, instead of a new game. 
 Anyhow, most of the time, it's going to be alright. There is a lot of potential for making the game better, putting funny interactions and whatnot. Hopefully the devs will keep working on it and iron out the bugs

Edit: I have put a negative review, because almost every game had someone disconnecting without joining back, which led to playing against some extremely frustrating AIs.
Now it also happened to me, got disconnected, then when I rejoined, the game rolled back a lot, followed by reconnection after reconnection. Had to leave the game after all, which leads to bad karma, elo decrease and something else. It is bs, cause the game was a few turns from being won.
Fix your game

184156847.review:
[b] Catan Universe [/b], klasik masa oyunu Catan'ın dijital bir uyarlamasıdır. Bu platform, oyuncuların Android, iOS, Mac ve Windows cihazlarında Catan'ın temel oyunu ve çeşitli genişleme paketlerini deneyimlemelerine olanak tanır. 


[h3] Artılar: [/h3]

[b] Geniş İçerik Yelpazesi: [/b]Temel oyun ve çeşitli genişlemeler sayesinde farklı oyun deneyimleri sunar.
[b] Erişilebilirlik: [/b]Farklı cihazlarda oynanabilmesi, oyunu geniş bir oyuncu kitlesi için erişilebilir kılar.
[b] Ücretsiz Başlangıç: [/b]Temel oyun ücretsiz olarak sunulur; ek içerikler ise uygulama içi satın alımlarla edinilebilir.


[h3] Eksiler: [/h3]

[b] Bağlantı ve Performans Sorunları: [/b]Bazı kullanıcılar, bağlantı sorunları, grafiksel problemler ve oyun donmaları gibi teknik aksaklıklardan şikayet etmektedir. 
[b] Yavaş Oynanış: [/b]Bazı oyuncular, yapay zekanın hamle hızının çok hızlı olduğunu ve bu nedenle takip etmenin zorlaştığını belirtmektedir. 


[h3] Sonuç: [/h3]

[b] Catan Universe [/b], klasik Catan deneyimini dijital platformlara taşıyarak, farklı cihazlarda ve geniş bir içerik yelpazesiyle oyunculara sunmaktadır. Ancak, teknik sorunlar ve performansla ilgili bazı olumsuz geri bildirimler de bulunmaktadır. Catan hayranları için denemeye değer bir seçenek olsa da, kullanıcı deneyimi kişisel tercihlere bağlı olarak değişebilir.

Every time I try to play it goes to an old game from Oct. and stalls and I can't play.  They keep doing updates that say they fixed the problem but it hasn't worked.  Tried uninstalling the game and starting over but that didn't work either.  It's such a great game and this is really frustrating.  I would have recommended the game with a little patience while they figure it out but not any more.  I wouldn't want someone to pay for this game as is, super annoying.

183709416.review:
Ich kann die negativen Rezensionen an sich gut verstehen. Das Spiel wird als kostenlos auf Steam betitelt. Allerdings ist es im Spiel dann notwendig, dass man Geld ausgibt. Außerdem kommt es recht häufig zu Problemen und Fehlern. Das Spiel selbst und die Adaption sind allerdings gut. Mir macht das Spiel viel Freude, wenn es denn dann mal fehlerfrei funktioniert und man eine Lobby findet, in der die Mitspieler nicht direkt das Spiel beenden, sobald das Spiel nicht so läuft, wie sie es wollen. 

Schwierig finde ich allerdings, dass man auch dann Punkte abgezogen bekommt, wenn man ein verbuggtes Spiel verlässt. Mittlerweile sucht man teilweise auch sehr lange nach Mitspielern. Das war früher anders.

insgesamt würde ich das Spiel trotzdem empfehlen.

183702880.review: ai is incredibly anti-fun, will not trade with you ever because other ai accept faster meaning you are always at a disadvantage. also had games where the ai will just hoard cards to buy development cards to bully the lowest vp player. multiplayer also seems to not want you to play unless you have 4 players which is also frustrating. buy the actual board game over spending money for each game you want to play here.
